attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After many accidents, To educate cyclists and the police on TV and by signs  that it is an offence under the law to ride a bike on the pavement or footpath rather than the road, also to get the police and wardens to take action instead of ignoring it as they do at present.

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence "Stan Howes and work employees" to an action for HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
